original_title: Jazz Icons - John Coltrane Live In France 1965
overview: Features the Classic John Coltrane Quartet at the peak of their powers. Includes the only public performance of Ascension and of A Love Supreme which theyâ€™d recorded eight months earlier and had become an instant and influential hit in the jazz world. Every night this band played was a major event and spiritual experience for those who witnessed it.
title: Jazz Icons - John Coltrane Live In France 1965
